description:
11.203 random
Flush video frames from internal cache of frames into a random order.
No frame is discarded.
Inspired by frei0r nervous filter.
name: random

options.description: Set size in number of frames of internal cache, in range from 2 to 512. Default is 30.
options.name: frames

options.description: Set seed for random number generator, must be an integer included between 0 and UINT32_MAX. If not specified, or if explicitly set to less than 0, the filter will try to use a good random seed on a best effort basis.
options.name: seed
